body_html: Potentially related: I ran into the same issue when running standard estimator-based training on GCloud. In my case the trainer was accessing a GCS bucket in a different region (europe-west1 vs europe-west3, respectively). Setting GCS_READ_CACHE_MAX_SIZE_MB to 0 did not help. Placing both the worker and the bucket in a single region fixed the issue for me.

body: Potentially related: I ran into the same issue when running standard estimator-based training on GCloud. In my case the trainer was accessing a GCS bucket in a different region (europe-west1 vs europe-west3, respectively). Setting GCS_READ_CACHE_MAX_SIZE_MB to 0 did not help. Placing both the worker and the bucket in a single region fixed the issue for me.
